Smith or {Woolworth.There was too little compe- {tition with only one chemist in the {town.A furniture store would cut down {travelling.A few said they did not {like Coleford as a shopping centre.Recently competition has increased with the addition of a third supermarket.Some saw that as a good thing.Many were impressed with the building suppliers and{D.I.Y.shops.
